DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate food-effect one-dose Fluzoparib healthy subject . The participant receive Fluzoparib 120mg fed state Period 1 follow administration Fluzoparib 120mg fast state Period 2 .
DOC.criteria: Able willing give write informed consent . Must willing comply requirement study . Willing use medically acceptable method ( defined Investigator ) birth control 6 month . Male female age 1850 year . Weight 45kg , BMI within 18 28 kg/m2 . No clinically significant abnormality physical examination lab test . Pregnant breastfeed woman . No history alcohol drug abuse within past year . Participation clinical trial experimental drug device previous 3 month . Any medical condition clinical laboratory test judgment Investigator make subject unsuitable study .
